name: Mazing Together
description:
This game was inspired by a maze I once saw which you do with another person, the use of a phone was my spin on that.

Controls:

WASD / Arrows to move

Space to open phone

Mouse to click on options

Shout out:

A massive shoutout to Suzie for hand painting all of the artwork for the game! <3

Our usual shoutout to hZa for his work on the sound tracks.

And my housemates for keeping me up all night, letting me work on my game xD

Unseen parts:

Each option sent you on a different path for conversation, and this was tallied up so at the end you would get a different ending between 3 depending on which options you selected throughout. However, I wasn't able to implement it fully so left out the whole final scene.

Disclaimer:

As with all GameJam games I make, this is incredibly rough since I have the time management of a peanut so pls don't be too harsh. I constrained movement when getting a text just as it was the quickest way to avoid a million errors :)
